title: Mini-Ep 43: Solo Travel and Bridal Parties
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 43: Solo Travel and Bridal Parties
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate share a listener email about putting together a long-reads article club, and answer a question regarding the necessity of bridal parties. Plus, they hear from a listener in Paris whose break up (and encouragement from the Forever35 Faceb...
description:
Doree and Kate share a listener email about putting together a long-reads article club, and answer a question regarding the necessity of bridal parties. Plus, they hear from a listener in Paris whose break up (and encouragement from the Forever35 Facebook group) led her to take a solo trip abroad, and get a tip about healing c-section scars.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics - Get 2 leggings for only $24 (a $99 value!) when you sign up for a VIP membership. Just visit fabletics.com/forever35 to redeem this offer.
  • Blinkist - For a limited time, visit blinkist.com/forever to start your free 7-day trial.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
